title: Patching Issue Stuck reading files/0kbs FIX!!!
body:
Hi guys i have cam across a fix for the scanning file error and the 0kbs download patch error.

1. try to set your anti virus to low security.

2. if that fail uninstall your anti virus software, 10 - 30 secs after the antivirus uninstall.
     the patcher should continue again

the patcher stops because your antivirus (eg. Norton ,AVG ect ) believe its a dangerous file even if set on low security setting or even if you allow it.

replies.body: Didn't work for me, just like all the other methods i've tried... {{summoner:3}}
i know it was bad ive fixed it up now i was shatterd when i made this

"Hi guys i have cam"

"i have cam"

"cam"
